name: Chicken Coup
description:
Every year 9 billion chicken are raised and murdered so humans can devour them. Play as a chicken taking revenge on those who would cook him alive and stuff him into nuggets, in a over the top gory run n gun game. They screwed with the wrong chicken.

Coming to Steam Soon

THIS IS A DEMO

Controls:

Arrow keys to move and aim, z to jump, x to shoot, and v to position lock.

Play responsibly
